ygData.subject: Dual bonded dual class hybrids
ygData.msgSnippet: this class of hybrids is same as single bonded hybrids except for a few differences: 1)instead of sharing just health, these characters share health and mana.

Subject: Dual bonded dual class hybrids

this class of hybrids is same as single bonded hybrids except for a 
few differences:

1)instead of sharing just health, these characters share health and 
mana.  All attacks use two (or more) times as much mana.

2)both characters can access all abilities of the other character, but 
they both can't use the same attack at the same time.

Any comments about how strong this proposed type of hybrid would be?
